subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams defeated Vera Zvonareva 6-4, 7-6 to advance to play Marion Bartoli, the surprise finalist at Wimbledon.
snippet: Serena Williams defeated Vera Zvonareva 6-4, 7-6 to advance to play Marion Bartoli, the surprise finalist at Wimbledon.
